name: Just Breathe (kesbob, TheIronRabbit)
description:
Reach the end of the level by controlling your breathing. 

The feather indicates your current level of breathing. Keeping the feather within the box is your normal breathing rate. Stray too far in either direction and you eventually can't move.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Space - breathe

Credits:

Made for the GDEX 2021 Game Jam.

  • Made by Kyle, Reisig, Blake
  • Music https://johnleonardfrench.com/
  • Breathing sound https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/voices/human-vocal-sounds-1...
  • Other sounds https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256
  • Fonts - Chopin, Orial - dafont.com
  • Clam
